stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"不,无,非,没有"; 2. 表示"打开,解开,弄出"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 新奇的, 不熟悉的, 没有经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不,无,非,没有+familiar熟悉的→adj.新奇的, 不熟悉的, 没有经验的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不宜的, 不顺利的, 相反的, 令人不快的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不,无,非,没有+favorable赞成的, 有利的, 赞许的, 良好的→adj.不宜的, 不顺利的, 相反的, 令人不快的
un不,无,非,没有+known知道→adj.不知道的, 未知的 n.不知名的
un不,无,非,没有+official官方的→adj.非官方的
un不,无,非,没有+real真实的→adj.不真实

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未受损伤的,未遭伤害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不,无,非,没有+scathe损害,伤害+ed……的→adj.未受损伤的,未遭伤害的

un不,无,非,没有+toward顺利的→不顺的

un不,无,非,没有+abashed难为情的→adj.不害臊的
un不,无,非,没有+act扮演+ed表形容词→adj.未演出的
un不,无,非,没有+alloy合金,混合+ed……的→没混合的
un不,无,非,没有+ambitious有雄心的→adj.无野心的
un不,无,非,没有+assuming自以为是的→adj.不摆架子的

un不,无,非,没有+countable可计算的→adj.无数的, 不可数的
un不,无,非,没有+daunt沮丧+ed……的→没被吓倒的

Sentence.sentence: Millions of American families may now be in the initial stage of their responses to the current crisis, working together and supporting one another through the early months of unemployment.
Now, to get back to what I was saying, there's a lot of unemployment as well as geographical problems in the region.
As you are probably aware, the latest job markets news isn't good: Unemployment is still more than 9 percent, and new job growth has fallen close to zero.
Unemployment in January jumped to a 16-year high of 7.06 percent, as 598000 jobs were slashed from US payrolls in the worst single-month decline since December, 1974.
Collectively, we rely on the unemployment figures and other statistics to frame our sense of reality
The official unemployment rate is the product of a telephone survey of about 60000 homes.

sentences.en: The riots took place against a background of widespread unemployment.
sentences.cn: 暴乱是在普遍失业的情况下发生的。

sentences.en: A rapid rise in price soon eventuated in mass unemployment.
sentences.cn: 物价迅速上涨, 结果造成了大量失业。

sentences.en: Unemployment among married women reached a peak.
sentences.cn: 在已婚女性中失业率达到了峰值。

sentences.en: There is an equation between unemployment and rising crime levels.
sentences.cn: 失业人数增加则犯罪数量增加。

sentences.en: Unemployment was high despite the gains of the civil rights movement.
sentences.cn: 尽管民权运动有所进展, 失业率仍然很高。
